In this course we teach advanced functionality of the shell (specifically bash).
The course presentation is available [here](data/Advancing_with_the_Shell.pdf)

**Topics covered:**


* Customizing your Shell
* Bash: Expansions ans substitution
* Regular expression
* File manipulations with awk and sed
